name: Raptor Pack - Gamma
text: During your opponentâ€™s Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can destroy this face-up card and 1 card in your hand; Special Summon 1 "Raptor Pack" monster from your Extra Deck. If you control a level 7 or higher "Raptor Pack" monster, you can destroy 1 monster in your Deck instead of your hand. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except "Raptor Pack" monsters or Reptile-Type monsters. You can only activate the effect of "Raptor Pack - Gamma" once per turn.
